mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, writer_id, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.name AS writerName FROM post p JOIN member m ON p.writer_id = m.id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT p.*, m.name AS writerName FROM post p JOIN member m ON p.writer_id = m.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
